text:
Hi. Except for that the builds later than this one were 45 bytes, I wish to
report a critical bug. When starting Catalina and sending the first request to
the server, JavaVM core dumps. Here's a printout. Please tell me how I can
assist further:

su-2.05a# ./catalina.sh  run
Using CATALINA_BASE:   /usr/local/tomcat
Using CATALINA_HOME:   /usr/local/tomcat
Using CATALINA_TMPDIR: /usr/local/tomcat/temp
Using JAVA_HOME:       /usr/local/linux-jdk1.4.0

[INFO] Registry - -Loading registry information
[INFO] Registry - -Creating new Registry instance

Unexpected Signal : 11 occurred at PC=0x2A1F5D17
Function=[Unknown.]
Library=(N/A)

NOTE: We are unable to locate the function name symbol for the error
      just occurred. Please refer to release documentation for possible
      reason and solutions.


Current Java thread:

Dynamic libraries:
Can not get information for pid = 84252

Local Time = Sun Jun  9 19:09:50 2002
Elapsed Time = 5
#
# HotSpot Virtual Machine Error : 11
# Error ID : 4F530E43505002D3
# Please report this error at
# http://java.sun.com/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi
#
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (1.4.0-b92 mixed mode)
#
# An error report file has been saved as hs_err_pid84252.log.
# Please refer to the file for further information.
#
Abort trap (core dumped)
creator: niklas@saers.com

text:
Please do not report VM crashes (they are VM bugs) unless you can point out to a
particular Tomcat bug.
creator: remm@apache.org
